```{r nodaynt, cache=cacheon, fig.cap="Time to first NT-proBNP testing", fig.width=8, fig.height=7}


tmp <- left_join(rsdata %>% select(LopNr, shf_indexdtm),
  labnt,
  by = "LopNr"
) %>%
  mutate(tmptiment = as.numeric(labdtm - shf_indexdtm)) %>%
  filter(tmptiment > 0) %>%
  group_by(LopNr) %>%
  arrange(tmptiment) %>%
  slice(1) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(LopNr, labdtm, tmptiment)

tmp <- left_join(rsdata,
  tmp,
  by = "LopNr"
) %>%
  mutate(
    timent = pmin(tmptiment, sos_outtime_death, na.rm = T),
    nt = factor(if_else(timent == tmptiment & !is.na(tmptiment), 1, 0), levels = 0:1, labels = c("No", "Yes")),
  )

cexmy <- 1.2
fit <- survfit(Surv(timent, nt == "Yes") ~ whfe,
  data = tmp
)
# c(bottom, left, top, right)
par(mar = c(7, 6, 0.5, 3) + 0.1)
plots <- plot(fit,
  fun = "event",
  ylab = "First NT-proBNP testing",
  xscale = 365,
  yscale = 100,
  col = global_kicols,
  mark.time = FALSE,
  bty = "n",
  xlim = c(0, 366),
  ylim = c(0, 1),
  xlab = "Months",
  cex.lab = cexmy,
  axes = F,
  lwd = 3,
  lty = c(1, 2, 3, 4),
  xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i",
  conf.int = F
)

axis(2, seq(0, 1, 0.25), seq(0, 100, 25), las = 2, cex.axis = cexmy)
axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1) * 30.5 * 2, seq(0, 12, 2), cex.axis = cexmy)

ypos <- 1 - summary(fit, 366)$surv

ylabs <- bind_cols(
  ypos = c(ypos + c(0, 0)),
  ytext = levels(rsdata %>% pull(whfe))
)

mtext(
  side = 4,
  line = .2,
  at = ylabs$ypos,
  ylabs$ytext,
  las = 1,
  cex = cexmy,
)

mtext("No. at risk", side = 1, line = 3, at = -67, adj = 0, cex = cexmy, font = 2)
mtext("WHFE", side = 1, line = 5, at = -67, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)
mtext("NWHFE", side = 1, line = 6, at = -67, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)

nrisk <- summary(fit, seq(0, 6, 1) * 30.5 * 2, extend = T)

axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1) * 30.5 * 2, labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == "whfe=WHFE"], line = 4, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy)
axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1) * 30.5 * 2, labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == "whfe=NWHFE"], line = 5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy)

sfit <- summary(fit)$table
pfit <- paste0(sfit[1, 7], " (", sfit[1, 8], "-", sfit[1, 9], ") days")
text(8 * 30.5, 0.25, "Median days (95% CI)")
text(8 * 30.5, 0.2, paste0("WHFE: ", sfit[1, 7], " (", sfit[1, 8], "-", sfit[1, 9], ")"))
text(8 * 30.5, 0.15, paste0("NWHFE: ", sfit[2, 7], " (", sfit[2, 8], "-", sfit[2, 9], ")"))
```
